Package de.stock.action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAction
    Interface for actions

    The action system knows two types of actions which start and stop without the players influence (they run a number of rounds)

    - MainEvent can start on his own or by another event.

    - SubEvent can be started by another event only.

    and one extraordinary

    - LevelPack gets chosen by player at startup and has goals to complete to get to next level.
      These level packs are seperated into different level stages and if one is finished the next (more difficult) level stage gets played
      (See LevelPack for further information)

    Action developers must instantiate MainEvent, SubEvent or LevelPack
    They must not instantiate Action
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Base class of actions

    The action system knows two types of actions which start and stop without the players influence (they run a number of rounds)

    - MainEvent can start on his own or by another event.

    - SubEvent can be started by another event only.

    and one extraordinary

    - LevelPack gets chosen by player at startup and has goals to complete to get to next level.
      These level packs are seperated into different level stages and if one is finished the next (more difficult) level stage gets played
      (See LevelPack for further information)

    Action developers must instantiate MainEvent, SubEvent or LevelPack
    They must not instantiate Action
    ActionObserver
    The action observer holds all main events, currently active events and currently active levels.

    It does not hold the sub events as these can be called by other events only

    The action observer iterates every round over:

    - all (not running) main events to check if they are ready to be executed and executes them if time has come.

    - all running events and checks if their days are over.
      If their days are over it gets a successor event if available, starts this event and removes the old one from the list of running events.

    - all running levels and checks if their goal is reached
      If their goal is reached it gives the user the prize/shows the award and gets the next level (from same stage or next stage) if available
